member.name: M:ThunderRoad.Utilities.ValueModifierBase.ProcessValue(ThunderRoad.Utilities.ValueModifierSequence.ValueModifierSequenceOutput)
member.summary: Process the value from the given sequence-output.
member.param: Sequence-output to read the value from.
member.returns: The sequence-output after setting its value to the processed one

member.name: T:ThunderRoad.Utilities.ValueModifierSequence.ValueModifierSequenceOutput
member.summary: Class used to hold the different values from the sequence, to allow multiple type branching in parallel

member.name: M:ThunderRoad.Utilities.ValueModifierSequence.RetrieveModifiers
member.summary: Retrieves the modifiers and order them from their "order" serialized field

member.name: M:ThunderRoad.Utilities.ValueModifierSequence.RunSequence(System.Object)
member.summary: Runs the sequence from input value through all modifiers

member.name: M:ThunderRoad.Utilities.ValueModifierSequence.ProcessOutput(ThunderRoad.Utilities.ValueModifierSequence.ValueModifierSequenceOutput)
member.summary: Invoke the different events from the sequence outputs
member.param: Output from the previously ran sequence
